Title: Cross-Site Scripting
Description: Potential Security Issues in Bundled Dojo Library.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.9.0 before 1.9.8, all versions starting from 1.10.0 before 1.10.3
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.9.0, all versions starting from 1.9.8 before 1.10.0, all versions starting from 1.10.3
